Posts.Content: Hi Kaz, thanks v much for your reply. They have called me in to check something that has shown up - so this time the tests will go further and if required they will give me a biopsy. It could be ok - we shall see, but worrying due to family history of other cancers which have been serious... babby steps tho'.. u take care 2 luv  x
Posts.Title: Worried about the assessment

Posts.Content: Hi Clair Thanks for your message - it must've been a shockfor you -  I was panicking going for the assessment.. they said all is well, that the mammogram was showind tissue overlapping.. It was a Huge worry given my family history and current news of my cousin. I was so nervous going for the assessment, I am still exhausted from worry. But you are doing really well - you got your op really quickly, how did it go and how are you feeling? I can't thank you enough for taking the time to message me Clair u are strong and it's very encouraging that you are so caring. Have a speedy and full recovery to health, Diana XXX
Posts.Title: Worried about the assessment

Posts.Content: Hi I just an appointment for two days time as a mammogram showed up an area for further investigation. It is so worrying not knowing what the outcome may be and how it could affect my life - and I amazed at how brave everyone on here is. My mum had a lumpectomy over 2 years ago now and my cousin has recently been diagnosed with terminal cancer at 40, 2 of my aunts died from cancer in their 40s and 50s, and my sister is in remission from another type of cancer. Any advice would be appreciated and I will let you know how I get on if I can... thanks
Posts.Title: Worried about the assessment

Posts.Content: Hi - just to update that the results were clear - thank you all for your support - it is a blessing that you care for others and u go thru so much yourselves. I had so much going on my head when I had to go for the result I had visions of moving away to go nearer my family. My mum had her lumpectomy a few years ago and is still on the meds but all is clear so far since her op!! Take care x
Posts.Title: Worried about the assessment
